sampleDescriptions:
HR 1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act - Include the "Phase 0, Proof of Concept" program language to extend authorization for one additional year.

Increase funding for the TRIO Program.

HR 4508, PROSPER ACT - Preserve supplemental educational opportunity grants, reduce PELL Grant counseling requirements, preserve subsidized loans, preserve Perkins Loan program, preserve Graduate PLUS
